Portsmouth Cycle Forum

Portsmouth Cycle Forum is a group for anyone who cycles, or wants to cycle, in and around Portsmouth UK.

newsletter

Portsmouth Cycle Forum April Newsletter

Friday 15 April 2011
1 min

The April Newsletter is now available with the latest news and views on cycling in Portsmouth.

This month we look at so-called Dangerous Cycling, we report on the Polite Cycling initiative and we bring you up-to-date on Portsmouth City Council's latest transport initiatives.  A PDF version is also available.
